title: (1) Sketch; (2) The Mäuseturm, Burg Klopp and Bingen, Upstream; (3) Burg Ehrenfels, Downstream, with Detail of the Burg; (4) The Mäuseturm, Burg Klopp and Bingen, Looking Upstream from the Binger Loch; (5) The Maüseturm and Burg Ehrenfels, Downstream
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
